text:
@realDonaldTrump Nancy Pelosi
Everything Trump does is a distraction
He wants you to focus on anything other than the pain of 100,000 U.S. deaths & the 41 million jobless claims since the start of the #coronavirus crisis
He's been an astronomical failure & a terrible example who must be voted out
